INSERT INTO item (site_id, path, preview_url, state, owned_by, created_by, last_modified_by, last_modified_on, last_published_on, label, content_type_id, system_type, mime_type, disabled, locale_code, translation_source_id, size, parent_id, commit_id, previous_path, ignored) VALUES
(#{entry.siteId}, #{entry.path}, #{entry.previewUrl}, #{entry.state}, #{entry.ownedBy}, #{entry.createdBy}, #{entry.lastModifiedBy}, #{entry.lastModifiedOn}, #{entry.lastPublishedOn}, #{entry.label}, #{entry.contentTypeId}, #{entry.systemType}, #{entry.mimeType}, #{entry.disabledAsInt}, #{entry.localeCode}, #{entry.translationSourceId}, #{entry.size}, #{entry.parentId}, #{entry.commitId}, #{entry.previousPath}, #{entry.ignoredAsInt})
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE site_id = VALUES(site_id), path = VALUES(path), preview_url = VALUES(preview_url), state = VALUES(state), owned_by = VALUES(owned_by), last_modified_by = VALUES(last_modified_by), last_modified_on = VALUES(last_modified_on), last_published_on = VALUES(last_published_on), label = VALUES(label), content_type_id = VALUES(content_type_id), system_type = VALUES(system_type), mime_type = VALUES(mime_type), disabled = VALUES(disabled), locale_code = VALUES(locale_code), translation_source_id = VALUES(translation_source_id), size = VALUES(size), parent_id = VALUES(parent_id), commit_id = VALUES(commit_id), previous_path = VALUES(previous_path), ignored = VALUES(ignored)

select * from item where id = #{id} limit 0, 1

(select i1.id, i1.site_id, i1.path, i1.preview_url, i1.state, i1.owned_by, i1.created_by, i1.created_on, i1.last_modified_by, i1.last_modified_on, i1.last_published_on, i1.label, NULLIF(i1.content_type_id, '') as content_type_id, i1.system_type, i1.mime_type, i1.disabled, i1.locale_code, i1.translation_source_id, i1.size, i1.parent_id, i1.commit_id, i1.previous_path, i1.ignored from item i1, item i2 where i2.id = #{id} and i1.site_id = i2.site_id and i1.path RLIKE(CONCAT(i2.path, '/index\.xml$')) union select i3.id, i3.site_id, i3.path, i3.preview_url, i3.state, i3.owned_by, i3.created_by, i3.created_on, i3.last_modified_by, i3.last_modified_on, i3.last_published_on, i3.label, NULLIF(i3.content_type_id, '') as content_type_id, i3.system_type, i3.mime_type, i3.disabled, i3.locale_code, i3.translation_source_id, i3.size, i3.parent_id, i3.commit_id, i3.previous_path, i3.ignored from item i3 where i3.id = #{id}) limit 0, 1
